title: Notifications thingo
body:
http://puu.sh/d78rF.png
Why is it all spaced out like someone was pushing the enter button halfway through sentences?

replies.body: So, basically what I'm seeing is that implementing Boards was done so that Nazi mod could finally break loose of their shackles and go ham on innocent posts.
Because it's hitting the edge of the box.. I'm amazed you didn't pick that up.

> Because it's hitting the edge of the box.. I'm amazed you didn't pick that up.







'If you can answer

yes to any of the above"
Pretty sure there was room for that to go in... I'm amazed you didn't pick up on that.
